testcase.classname: to verify Multiple windows page scenarios.
testcase.name: to verify multiple windows
testcase.system-out: Given launch "chrome" browser...............................................passed Then launch url "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/".......................passed And verify page by "url" with "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/".........passed And verify page by "title" with "The Internet"..............................passed Then click on homepage link "Multiple Windows"..............................passed And verify page by "url" with "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/windows"..passed Then click on "Click Here" link.............................................passed Then switch to another window with title as "New Window"....................passed And verify text as "New Window".............................................passed Then switch to another window with title as "The Internet"..................passed And verify page by "url" with "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/windows"..passed
